I have downloaded and then promptly deleted just about every attack helicopter game out there. These air cavalry sims are just hands down the best. Like, it‚Äôs not even close and the real kick is most of them are free. So what am I talking about? Well first off, every single other game had graphics that are straight clip art. The chopper is basically on a tilt where the screen moves more than anything to simulate flying. With this game and other from mobile simulator, the helicopter actually moves around the screen. It‚Äôs hard to explain but if you play them you‚Äôll know. Most have 18-20 missions and you can play over and over. Yes you do have to buy some of the helicopters but it‚Äôs 1.99 each. Idk, I can‚Äôt believe the other morons even waste time by putting apps out. Get these you‚Äôll enjoy them.
